title: Sleeping Beauty
description: Relive the classic fairy tale of Sleeping Beauty in this beautifully illustrated picture book edition, based on the beloved 1697's story by Charles Perrault.Young and old fans alike will love this retelling of Walt Disney's Sleeping Beautyâ€”the story of Princess Aurora and the three good fairies who try to protect her from Maleficent's evil spell.This classic storybook accurately captures the movie's magic and places it right into a child's hands. With every turn of a page, an adventure unfolds to create memories that will last a lifetime.
author: Walt Disney Company
